meanings.definition: Blepharoplasty: a surgical procedure to improve the appearance of the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: After the blepharoplasty, her eyelids looked more youthful.
meanings.sent2: She underwent blepharoplasty to enhance her eyelid appearance.
meanings.sent3: The blepharoplasty made her eyelids look like they had a mini makeover.
meanings.sent4: Her blepharoplasty transformed her eyelids like a magic touch.
meanings.sent5: The blepharoplasty gave her eyelids a fresh and rejuvenated look.

meanings.definition: Blepharoplasty: the surgical repair or reconstruction of the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: The blepharoplasty successfully repaired her droopy eyelids.
meanings.sent2: His eyelids regained their function after the blepharoplasty.
meanings.sent3: The blepharoplasty fixed her eyelids like a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent4: After the blepharoplasty, her eyelids were as good as new.
meanings.sent5: The blepharoplasty restored her eyelids to their former glory.
